6301.name: The Webbed Entrance
6301.description: Sticky, sticky, sticky!  The ground is cluttered with leaves, decayed remains of webbed crickets, beetle, rats, dogs, and even humans.  You begin to wonder about what lies ahead.  The air is damp here, and even the little light that shines through the canopy seems to be absorbed into the webbing.

6302.name: The Webby Passage
6302.description: You find that footing here is very good, almost too good.  The limbs are coated with cobwebs and seem unusually strong for tree branches.  Paths lead in four directions.  The eastward path goes down a bit.

6303.name: The Wasp Hive
6303.description: Drones scuttle about in this room.  The cells on the walls are honeycomb in shape and many of the maggots and wasps you see have fang-marks on their bodies.  You sense some order in their markings.

6304.name: The Webby Passage
6304.description: Another webby passage, all sticky and wet.  Tiny ballooning spiders fill the air.  It seems that these young ones are newborns.

6305.name: Beneath The Busy Path
6305.description: You here the sounds of crawling arachnids above.  The rhythms of the footsteps suggest a primitive order in there movement.  The light seems brighter upwards.

6306.name: On The Busy Path
6306.description: Spiders, spiders, everywhere!  It is almost ant-like in efficiency with one big difference.  The spiders here are carrying ant-corpses, as well as rats, wolves, and humans.

6307.name: On The Busy Path
6307.description: Spiders, spiders, everywhere!  It is almost ant-like in efficiency with one big difference.  The spiders here are carrying ant-corpses, as well as cats, wolves, and humans.

6308.name: On The Busy Path
6308.description: Spiders, spiders, everywhere!  It is almost ant-like in efficiency with one big difference.  The spiders here are carrying ant-corpses, as well as cats, dogs, and humans.

6309.name: A Split In The Path
6309.description: As always, there is a split in the road.  One road is strewn with cricket feelers.  The other is well-kept and suitable for smooth travelling.  The webbing that was prevalent in earlier rooms is almost non-existant now.

6310.name: A Fuzzy Tree Limb
6310.description: You are on a 'fuzzy' tree limb.  Interesting, since the branches seem to have 'hairs' sprouting from its bark.  As you look closer you see millions of aphids covering each limb.

6311.name: The Tree Trunk
6311.description: You feel that you can rest here safely.  There is evidence of webbing here, but it is of a finer quality.

6312.name: The Tree Lair Entrance
6312.description: It seems the inhabitant of this place does not web her victims, as evidenced by the remains before you.  The area is cluttered with desiccated corpses, apparently bitten but unwebbed, and drained of their life juices.

6313.name: The Wolf Spider Lair
6313.description: Very dark, as all lairs of spiders are.  Not much of furnishings save an exit.  The wolf spider keeps no corpses here, but rather throws them out at her leisure.

6320.name: The Webless Path
6320.description: Strange.  No webbing here.  In fact, no sounds whatsoever.   The path continues northward, where you find that you may have to tightrope your way across a ravine.

6321.name: Above The Ravine
6321.description: Stranger still.  Your feet get a real firm grip on the spiderline. You are above a deep ravine.  This line connects you between two trees. Below you can see a prismatic web with lots of animal bones caught in it: some bear and small deer bones in fact.  No human skeletons are visible  (yet).

6322.name: The Rainbow Web
6322.description: This is the rainbow web -- each strand, each link, a hue of violently sharp colors and contrasts.  The resident here seems to have a command of light as well.

6323.name: The Web Forest
6323.description: The trees here take on a different appearance -- they are not trees anymore, but disjointed make-shift silken made shafts, sticky to the touch, and webby in texture.  This is another world it would appear.

6324.name: The Slave Pit
6324.description: You have entered the slave pit.  A voice blares in the distance, 'Get back to work, maggots!'  Rails upon rails of mined gold and silver clutter the trail beneath you.

6325.name: The Tether Path
6325.description: Another tether path just like the rest of them.  Surprisingly well-lit by the golden orbs that hang from the sides, you can see the paths become finer and finer in quality.

6326.name: A Road Crossing
6326.description: Another shifty little strand of webs, almost ethereal in nature.

6327.name: A Leader Strand
6327.description: This strand is weightier, more sturdy.  It shimmers as you step on it.  You are definitely not in the Midgaardian realms anymore.  Just where you are you can't tell.  It feels like you're moving through ether.  You can still get back down to more surer lands.

6328.name: The Entrance Of The Ethereal Web
6328.description: You are at the entrance to ethereal web.  Flickering in and out, in and out, each strand reveals a different hue from black to green  to blue.

6330.name: The Young Wormkin's Crib
6330.description: A playpen of sorts, with maggots of wasps and other baby vermin lying about.  You feel that humans have been played with here too, and eaten later.  You sense that the maker of this place has an appetite for dragon meat, and uses this room as a breeding area.

6331.name: The Base Of The Web
6331.description: Large strands connect at this point.  The node shimmers and flickers within the ether.  You see many flying creatures -- insects, pegasi, and dragon wormkins -- navigate the dangerous passages of the web.  Exits go in many directions.

6332.name: Through The Trees
6332.description: This part of the web intersects through the branches of some trees.  Various leaves and other debris that the many drones have not picked up yet lie here.

6333.name: Above The Clouds
6333.description: You can see all of Midgaard in this ethereal web.  Many of the larger dragons that do wish to fly seem to fly away from the sticky strands of the web.

6334.name: On A Cloud
6334.description: This cloud is rather thick in consistency.  You suddenly realize this is not a typical cloud, but it might be the nest of an aerial creature.

6335.name: A Link In The Ethereal Web
6335.description: This is another link in the ethereal web.  Various creatures seem to get caught (or hypnotized) by its sticky strands.

6336.name: The Tenuous Strand
6336.description: Very windy here since it goes up into the sky somewhat.  Still, it is safe enough to move around.

6340.name: The Elder Wormkin's Room
6340.description: A more mature wormkin it seems resides here.  Various tomes of arcane lore clutter the area, along with shards of armor and weaponry.

6341.name: Another Tree Limb
6341.description: Once again the web crosses another tree limb.  To the side you see the possible entrance to another creature's lair.

6342.name: The Bird Spider's Lair
6342.description: This is a big game hunter among most spiders.  Crushed jewels and weapons suggest the inhabitant must have powerful jaws.  Beware!

6345.name: A Link In The Ethereal Web
6345.description: This is another link in the ethereal web.  Various creatures seem to get caught (or hypnotized) by its sticky strands.

6346.name: The Quiet Tree Top
6346.description: This is a quiet tree top.  Downwards you can see a familiar path that may lead back to Midgaard.

6347.name: On The Web
6347.description: RRRRRRRRRRROOOOOOOOOOOOOAAAAAAAAAAAAAARR!  You hear the roar of a powerful beast.  Dragon, you think.  You shiver in your boots as you tiptoe along this section of the web.

6350.name: The Ki-Rin Chamber
6350.description: A wise ki-rin was entrapped here many years ago.  It is from her that the ruler of this realm draws magical strength.

6355.name: A Link In The Ethereal Web
6355.description: This is another link in the ethereal web.  Various creatures seem to get caught (or hypnotized) by its sticky strands.  To the north you sense the heavy breathing of a fiery animal.

6360.name: Yevaud's Lair
6360.description: Yevaud, the Usurper of Midgaard, resides here.  A voice cries out, 'BEWARE, the Usurper of Midgaard lives here!  FLEE while you can!' But even Yevaud has his master... or so you deduce.

6365.name: A Link In The Ethereal Web
6365.description: This is another link in the ethereal web.  Various creatures seem to get caught (or hypnotized) by its sticky strands.  A single spider line lies to the north, while ghastly seemings are due southward.  The grim entrance of Arachnos' Lair is downward.

6366.name: The Entrance To The Donjonkeep
6366.description: A dark path at the end of the web strand, you see ahead a torch lit chamber where the souls of unavenged adventurers come and gnash their teeth.  The howls and screams of many echo through the hall ways.  You see one definite path ahead.

6367.name: The Guardian's Room
6367.description: A chair sits here for a tireless guardian who ensures that no soul escapes.  Other than that, the room is undecorated.

6368.name: The Realm Of The Hopeless
6368.description: Here you see many misguided souls who think they still live. They search for those who killed them without warrant, and seek the free souls of living beings to inhabit and perhaps adventure once more.

6369.name: The Realm Of The Hopeless
6369.description: Here you see many misguided souls who think they still live. They search for those who killed them without warrant, and seek the free souls of living beings to inhabit and perhaps adventure once more.

6370.name: The Donjonkeep
6370.description: No souls have ever lived in this place.  The wails of slaves and the howls of wolves are the only way you can describe the sounds you hear.  The walls are thin and wispy.  The only light you receive is the shimmering from the strand of the ethereal web you used to get here.

6371.name: The Single Spider Line
6371.description: A single spider line supports you once more.  As you look across the ether you seen a single shack up ahead with a light in the window. You sense a great evil coming from the north and feel inclined to go back on the ethereal web and take your chances there.

6372.name: The Single Spider Line
6372.description: A single spider line supports you once more.  The shack comes closer into view and you are even more inclined to go back now.

6373.name: The Hermit's Corner
6373.description: Here you see evidence of a vagrant's abode.  The shack is to the north, if you dare enter it.  You get the sneaking feeling you should go back now.  The skies above you darken and roar with the laughter of thunder.

6380.name: Mahatma's Inescapable Trap
6380.description: Mahatma, that silly thief, is here, and he steals everything you have.  He says 'Here, have a quick trip to the Temple of Midgaard.' He plunges a black dagger into your back...

6390.name: The Entrance To The Arachnos' Lair
6390.description: All strands inevitably lead here, the center of the web, the entrance to Arachnos' Lair.

6391.name: The Sticky Chamber
6391.description: You can still bail out since your knees are shaking from the anticipation (or is it fear?).  The sky is clear on this strand of  web, surprisingly unsticky.  The strand does not vibrate like the  others.  A few ballooning spiders pass by, cackling 'You're gonna die, you're gonna fry.  Good bye!'

6392.name: The Great Door
6392.description: Before you you see a large, web-like door.  Various designs of ancient runes and names of Midgaard heroes are etched into the webwork.  Perhaps lists of victims?  You can't tell.

6399.name: The Lair Of Arachnos
6399.description: This is the lair of the Empress Spider, Arachnos.  You can see a lavishly adorned rainbow web, her lair allows her to move to any universe she wishes by using her magical strands to the Prime Material Plane.  Coffers upon coffers of gold, magical jewels and gems await.  Unfortunately Arachnos is a baggy spider too, and webs all her treasures to her beautiful silken body.

6301.name: spider
6301.long_desc: The young spider is ballooning by you.
6301.description:
He looks freshly hatched and sprightly.  His young fangs are just
growing in as of late.

6302.name: yevaud
6302.long_desc: Yevaud, the Usurper of Midgaard is here, grinning evilly at you.
6302.description: Old, scaly, but still with a lot of bite in him left.

6303.name: spider
6303.long_desc: The wolf spider is here, licking its bloody fangs.
6303.description: The wolf spider is hairy, very hairy.

6304.name: orc
6304.long_desc: The orc is stuck in the web and he can't get out.
6304.description:
You notice an evil look in his eyes, but he seems quite drained of life,
and all he can do is glare at you while he's stuck in this web.

6305.name: wasp
6305.long_desc: The queen wasp is here, thinking how tasty you look.
6305.description: You notice a glazed look in her eyes.

6306.name: spider
6306.long_desc: A drone spider walks around doing its master's bidding.

6307.name: spider
6307.long_desc: An ethereal spider strides here, traveling to different worlds.
6307.description:
She winks in and out of reality.  It looks like it'd be difficult to hit her
without a magical weapon.

6308.name: slave
6308.long_desc: A human slave of Arachnos works here relentlessly.
6308.description:
The slave does not mind you, but will fight like a warrior if attacked.
He serves the spider Empress, Arachnos, though whether it is by choice
or because he was beguiled, you are not fully certain.

6309.name: quasit
6309.long_desc: A quasit blinks in and out, grinning at you.
6309.description:
Demoniac in nature, but more mischievous.  He twiddles his thumbs
and creates a magical treasure!

6310.name: spider
6310.long_desc: The bird spider snaps its powerful jaws.
6310.description: The Bird Spider has very powerful jaws.

6311.name: hermit
6311.long_desc: The hermit sits here and warns, 'Go back before it is too late!'
6311.description:
A dishevelled veteran warrior in disguise is what he is, but he
means well.

6312.name: donjonkeeper
6312.long_desc: The Donjonkeeper eyes you and wonders how pure your soul is.
6312.description:
He delves deeper into you as you stare at him.  Only those free of taint
will be allowed to remain here safely.

6313.name: guardian
6313.long_desc: The guardian is obviously not doing his job.
6313.description: He looks like a lazy bum who sleeps half the time.

6314.name: arachnos
6314.long_desc: Arachnos the Empress of Spiders welcomes you with an evil smile.
6314.description:
She is a very attractive spider with an ornate gown.  She tempts you
into being one of her many slaves.  She does not possess the venomous
fangs of normal spiders, but then, as you realize, she does not need
them.

6315.name: ki-rin
6315.long_desc: The Ki-Rin smiles good-naturedly to you.
6315.description:
She is the last bastion of good in this realm.  Her mission is to
someday free the slaves of the Empress.  She has been trapped here for
time eternal, and now the evil power of Arachnos feeds upon her intense
magical energies.  She will never give up here fight against evil,
though, and will continue her work in whatever manner presents itself.

6316.name: dragon
6316.long_desc: A wormkin with no teeth plays here.
6316.description: It is a rather small dragon, and you almost feel sad about killing it.

6317.name: dragon
6317.long_desc: A wormkin that has grown a bit stares at you inquisitively.
6317.description:
A medium-sized dragon -- seems it hasn't killed anything yet by itself, 
though there is a first time for everything...

6300.name: key
6300.room_desc: A somewhat plain black key has been left here.

6301.name: knife
6301.room_desc: A very sharp knife lies here.

6302.name: hat
6302.room_desc: A blue wizard's hat lies here.

6303.name: headress
6303.room_desc: A white cone-shaped head ornament with religious symbols lies here.

6305.name: potion
6305.room_desc: A thick white potion has been left here.
